docs.title: Odiplus Investment Documentation
docs.text: Welcome to the official documentation hub for Odiplus Investment — a Botswana-based general services company building a strong foundation to grow into construction, supplies, and farming support services.

docs.title: What you’ll find here
docs.text:
Use this space to keep your company information clear, consistent, and easy to update:

  • Company Overview (About, services, focus areas)
  • Policies & Procedures (SOPs, quality, safety, compliance)
  • Project Notes (construction/site work, procurement, farming activities)
  • Templates (quotations, invoices, delivery notes, checklists)
  • Contacts & Communication (key channels and outreach)

docs.title: 🏗️ Construction Support
docs.text:
• Building & renovation assistance
  • General maintenance
  • Site support services

docs.title: 📦 Supplies & Procurement Support
docs.text:
• Office & operational supplies
  • Building materials support
  • General procurement facilitation

docs.title: 🌾 Farming Support
docs.text:
• Seasonal crop & field assistance
  • Farm support services
  • Agricultural supply coordination

docs.title: Quick links
docs.text:
Start with these core pages (create these files in your docs folder if you haven’t yet):

  • About → about.md
  • Contact → contact.md
  • Services → services.md
  • Company Profile → company-profile.md
  • Templates → templates/index.md
  • Projects → projects/index.md

docs.title: Getting started (recommended structure)
docs.text:
If you’re using MkDocs, a clean structure could look like this:

docs/
  index.md
  about.md
  contact.md
  services.md
  assets/
    odiplus-logo.jpeg
  templates/
    index.md
  projects/
    index.md

docs.title: Brand message
docs.text: Reliable service delivery. Professional conduct. Continuous improvement.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text:
For enquiries, partnerships, or service requests:

  • Cellphone: 71366022
  • WhatsApp: 71366022

Odiplus Investment — Building today with tomorrow in mind.

docs.title: About Odiplus Investment
docs.text:
Odiplus Investment is a proudly Botswana-based general services company committed to delivering reliable, professional, and value-driven solutions across multiple sectors.

We are strategically building a strong operational foundation to expand into construction, supplies, and farming services as part of our structured growth and diversification plan.

docs.title: 1. Construction Services
docs.text:
We provide dependable support in: - Building and renovation assistance - General maintenance services - Site support and operational services

Our goal is to contribute to efficient, quality-driven project execution.

docs.title: 2. Supplies & Procurement Support
docs.text:
We assist organizations and individuals with: - Office and operational supplies - Building materials support - General procurement facilitation

We prioritize efficiency, quality sourcing, and timely delivery.

docs.title: 3. Farming & Agricultural Support
docs.text:
We offer practical support services in: - Seasonal crop and field assistance - Farm operational support - Agricultural supply coordination

We are committed to supporting sustainable agricultural development.

docs.title: Our Focus
docs.text:
At Odiplus Investment, our operations are guided by three core principles:

  • Reliable Service Delivery -- We deliver what we promise, on time and with consistency.
  • Professional Conduct -- We uphold integrity, accountability, and excellence in all engagements.
  • Continuous Improvement -- We embrace growth, innovation, and ongoing service enhancement.

Odiplus Investment --- Building today with tomorrow in mind.

docs.title: Contact Odiplus Investment
docs.text: We would be pleased to hear from you. Whether you require general services support, partnership discussions, or further information about our expanding operations, feel free to reach out.

docs.title: Contact Details
docs.text: 📞 Cellphone: 71366022\ 💬 WhatsApp: 71366022\ 📧 Email: omoaletsane@gmail.com\ 🔗 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/oduetse-moaletsane-38915359/

docs.title: Business Hours
docs.text:
Monday -- Friday: 08:00 -- 17:00\ Saturday: By appointment\ Sunday & Public Holidays: Closed

Odiplus Investment --- Reliable. Professional. Progressive.
